insert_section.sql_statement: INSERT INTO gg_regression (suite_name, test_name, status, date, build, run_no, logfilename) VALUES ('$twister_suite_name','$twister_tc_name','$twister_tc_status','$twister_tc_date_finished','$release.$build',1,'log')

field.Label: Select date
field.SQLQuery: SELECT DISTINCT date FROM gg_regression ORDER BY date

field.SQLQuery: SELECT DISTINCT date FROM gg_regression ORDER BY date

field.Label: Select date End
field.SQLQuery: SELECT DISTINCT date FROM gg_regression ORDER BY date

field.SQLQuery: SELECT DISTINCT status FROM gg_regression ORDER BY status

field.Label: Select release
field.SQLQuery: SELECT DISTINCT SUBSTRING(build, 1, 6) AS X FROM gg_regression ORDER BY X

field.Label: Select build
field.SQLQuery: SELECT DISTINCT build FROM `gg_regression` ORDER BY build

field.Label: Select suite
field.SQLQuery: SELECT DISTINCT suite_name FROM `gg_regression` ORDER BY suite_name

report.SQLQuery: SELECT * FROM gg_regression WHERE build = '@Build@' AND suite_name = '@Suite@'
SELECT build AS Build, COUNT(status) AS 'Percent (%)' FROM gg_regression WHERE Build LIKE '@Release@%' AND status='@TestStatus@' GROUP BY build
report.SQLTotal: SELECT build AS Build, COUNT(status) AS 'Percent (%)' FROM gg_regression WHERE Build LIKE '@Release@%' GROUP BY build

report.SQLQuery: SELECT status AS 'Status',COUNT(status) AS 'Count' FROM gg_regression WHERE build = '@Build@' group by status
SELECT Build, COUNT(status) AS 'Pass Rate (%)' FROM gg_regression WHERE Build LIKE '@Release@%' AND status='Pass' GROUP BY Build
report.SQLTotal: SELECT Build, COUNT(status) AS 'Pass Rate (%)' FROM gg_regression WHERE Build LIKE '@Release@%' GROUP BY Build
